trans-unit.source: Theborder-inline-end-widthCSS property defines the width of the logical inline-end border of an element, which maps to a physical border width depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-width, border-right-width, border-bottom-width, or border-left-width property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-end-width CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到物理边界宽度取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的逻辑直列端边界的宽度。它对应于 border-top-width ， border-right-width ， border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: Theborder-inline-startCSS property is a shorthand property for setting the individual logical inline-start border property values in a single place in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-start CSS属性是一个简写属性在样式表一个单一的地方设置单独的逻辑直列开始border属性值。

trans-unit.source: Theborder-inline-styleCSS property defines the style of the logical inline borders of an element, which maps to a physical border style depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-style and border-bottom-style, or border-left-style and border-right-style properties depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.

There are more than 100 different properties in CSS and a nearly infinite number of different values. Not all pairs of properties and values are allowed and each property defines what are the valid values. When a value is not valid for a given property, the declaration is deemed invalid and is wholly ignored by the CSS engine.

trans-unit.source: There are some key differences with how a grid layout works over the grid systems you may have used previously. As you can see, we do not need to add any markup to create a row, grid systems need to do this to stop elements popping up into the row above. With CSS Grid Layout, we can place things into rows, with no danger of them rising up into the row above if it is left empty. Due to this strict column and row placement we can also easily leave white space in our layout. We also don’t need special classes to pull or push things, to indent them into the grid. All we need to do is specify the start and end line for the item.
trans-unit.target: 网格布局在以前使用的网格系统上的工作方式存在一些关键差异。如您所见，我们不需要添加任何标记来创建行，网格系统需要这样做以阻止元素弹出到上方的行中。使用CSS Grid Layout，我们可以将事物放置到行中，而没有留空的话，它们也不会上升到上方的行中。由于这种严格的列和行放置方式，我们还可以轻松地在布局中保留空白。我们也不需要特殊的类来拉或推东西，以使它们缩进网格中。我们需要做的就是指定项目的开始和结束行。

trans-unit.source: There is a mention in the specification of anonymous grid items. These are created if you have a string of text inside your grid container, that is not wrapped in any other element. In the example below we have three grid items, assuming you had set the parent with a class of grid to display: grid. The first is an anonymous item as it has no enclosing markup, this item will always be dealt with via the auto-placement rules. The other two are grid items enclosed in a div, they might be auto-placed or you could place these with a positioning method onto your grid.
trans-unit.target: 匿名网格项目的规范中有提及。如果您在网格容器中有一个文本字符串，但没有将其包装在任何其他元素中，则会创建这些字符串。在下面的例子中，我们有三个网格项目，假设你已经设置父一类的 grid ，以 display: grid 。第一个是匿名项目，因为它没有封闭的标记，该项目将始终通过自动放置规则进行处理。另外两个是包含在div中的网格项，它们可以自动放置，也可以使用定位方法将它们放置到网格中。

trans-unit.source: There is a new attribute, font-optical-sizing, created to support variable fonts in CSS. When using font-optical-sizing, the only allowed values are auto or none — so this attribute only allows for turning optical sizing on or off. However when using font-variation-settings: 'opsz' <num>, you can supply a numeric value. In most cases you would want to match the font-size (the physical size the type is being rendered) with the opsz value (which is how optical sizing is intended to be applied when using auto). The option to provide a specific value is provided so that should it be necessary to override the default — for legibility, aesthetic, or some other reason — a specific value can be applied.
trans-unit.target: 创建了一个新属性 font-optical-sizing ，以支持CSS中的可变字体。使用 font-optical-sizing 时，唯一允许的值是 auto 或 none -因此，此属性仅允许打开或关闭光学大小。但是，当使用 font-variation-settings: 'opsz' <num> ，您可以提供一个数值。在大多数情况下，您可能希望将 font-size （正在呈现该类型的物理大小）与 opsz 值（这是在使用 auto 时要应用光学尺寸调整的方式）进行匹配）。提供了提供特定值的选项，以便在有必要覆盖默认值时（出于易读性，美观性或其他原因），可以应用特定值。

trans-unit.source: There is a second value for balancing, balance-all, which attempts to balance all columns in fragmented contexts and not just the columns on the final fragment.
trans-unit.target: 第二个平衡值是 balance-all ，它试图平衡零散上下文中的所有列，而不仅仅是最终片段中的列。

trans-unit.source: There is a soft wrap opportunity around every typographic character unit, including around any punctuation character or preserved white spaces, or in the middle of words, disregarding any prohibition against line breaks, even those introduced by characters with the GL, WJ, or ZWJ character class or mandated by the word-break property. The different wrapping opportunities must not be prioritized. Hyphenation is not applied.

There is a specific use case in Flexbox where we might think that a justify-self property is what we need, and this is when we want to split a set of flex items, perhaps to create a split navigation pattern. For this use case we can use an auto margin. A margin set to auto will absorb all available space in its dimension. This is how centering a block with auto margins works. By setting the left and right margin to auto, both sides of our block try to take up all of the available space and so push the box into the centre.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox中有一个特定的用例，我们可能认为我们需要一个 justify-self 属性，这是我们想要拆分一组flex项（也许要创建拆分的导航模式）的时候。对于此用例，我们可以使用 auto 边距。设置为 auto 的边距将吸收其尺寸中的所有可用空间。这就是使用自动页边距将块居中的方式。通过将左右边距设置为 auto ，我们区块的两侧会尝试占用所有可用空间，然后将盒子推到中间。

trans-unit.source: There is a specific use case in Flexbox where we might think that a justify-self property is what we need, and this is when we want to split a set of flex items, perhaps to create a split navigation pattern. For this use case, we can use an auto margin. A margin set to auto will absorb all available space in its dimension. This is how centering a block with auto margins works. By setting the left and right margin to auto, both sides of our block try to take up all of the available space and so push the box into the center.

trans-unit.source: There is also the notion of spacing. Proportional spacing is the normal setting, whereas tabular spacing lines up numerals evenly regardless of character width, making it more appropriate for lining up tables of numbers in financial tables.
trans-unit.target: 还有就是间距的概念。比例间距是正常的设置,而表格间距则是将数字均匀地排列起来,而不考虑字符的宽度,因此更适合于财务表格中数字表格的排列。

trans-unit.source: There is another group of statements – the nested statements. These are statements that can be used in a specific subset of at-rules – the conditional group rules. These statements only apply if a specific condition is matched: the @media at-rule content is applied only if the device on which the browser runs matches the expressed condition; the @document at-rule content is applied only if the current page matches some conditions, and so on. In CSS1 and CSS2.1, only rulesets could be used inside conditional group rules. That was very restrictive and this restriction was lifted in CSS Conditionals Level 3. Now, though still experimental and not supported by every browser, conditional group rules can contain a wider range of content: rulesets but also some, but not all, at-rules.
trans-unit.target: 还有另一组语句– 嵌套语句。这些是可以在规则的特定子集（条件组规则）中使用的语句。这些语句仅在满足特定条件时才适用： @media 规则内容仅在运行浏览器的设备与所表达的条件匹配时才适用；在 @document 只有在当前页面匹配某些条件下，等在规则内容应用。在CSS1和CSS2.1中，条件组规则中只能使用规则集。这是非常严格的，在CSS条件级别3中取消了此限制。现在，尽管条件组规则仍处于试验阶段，并非所有浏览器都支持，但条件组规则可以包含更广泛的内容：规则集，但也可以包含一些（但不是全部）规则。

trans-unit.source: There is no method in flexbox to tell items in one row to line up with items in the row above — each flex line acts like a new flex container. trans-unit.source: Therefore you can think of every box in CSS working in this way. The box itself has an outer display type, so it knows how to behave alongside other boxes. It then has an inner display type which changes the way its children behave. Those children then have an outer and inner display type too. The flex items in the previous example become flex level boxes, so their outer display type is dictated by way of them being part of the flex formatting context. They have an inner display type of flow however, meaning that their children participate in normal flow. Items nested inside our flex item lay themselves out as block and inline elements unless something changes their display type.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以想到CSS中的每个框都以这种方式工作。盒子本身具有外部显示类型，因此它知道如何与其他盒子一起工作。然后，它具有内部显示类型，该类型可以更改其子代的行为方式。这些孩子然后也具有外部和内部显示类型。上一个示例中的flex项成为flex级别框，因此它们的外部显示类型由它们作为flex格式化上下文的一部分来决定。但是，他们具有内部显示类型的流程，这意味着他们的孩子会参与正常流程。嵌套在我们flex项目中的项目会以block和inline元素的形式进行布局，除非某些更改了它们的显示类型。

trans-unit.source: These examples point to another key difference between these layout methods. In Grid Layout you do the majority of sizing specification on the container, setting up tracks and then placing items into them. In flexbox, while you create a flex container and set the direction at that level, any control over item sizing needs to happen on the items themselves.
trans-unit.target: 这些例子指出了这些布局方法之间的另一个关键区别。在Grid Layout中,您在容器上进行大部分的尺寸规范,设置轨道,然后将项目放入其中。在flexbox中,虽然您创建了一个flex容器并在该层级设置了方向,但对项目尺寸的任何控制都需要发生在项目本身。

trans-unit.source: These properties deal with aligning the item inside the grid area it is placed into. The properties align-items and justify-items are applied to the grid container and set the align-self and justify-self properties as a group. This means that you can set alignment for all of your grid Items at once, then override any items that need a different alignment by applying the align-self or justify-self property to the rules for the individual grid Items.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性用于在放置项目的网格区域内对齐项目。将属性 align-items 和 justify-items 应用于网格容器，并将 align-self 和 justify-self 属性设置为一个组。这意味着您可以一次为所有网格项目设置对齐方式，然后通过将 align-self 或 justify-self 属性应用于各个网格项目的规则来覆盖需要其他对齐方式的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: These properties deal with aligning the tracks of the grid when there is extra space to distribute. This scenario will occur if the tracks that you have defined total less than the total width of the grid container.

trans-unit.source: These properties started life in the flexbox specification, but are now also part of the Box Alignment Specification. trans-unit.source: These small tweaks are the sort of cases where the order property makes sense. Keep the logical order as the reading and tab order of the document, and maintain that in the most accessible and structured fashion. Then use order for purely visual design tweaks. When doing so take care that you are not reordering items that could be accessed by the keyboard as a user is tabbing around. Especially when using newer layout methods you should ensure that your browser testing includes testing the site using keyboard only, rather than a mouse or touchscreen. You will quickly see if your development choices make getting around the content difficult.
trans-unit.target: 这些小的调整是 order 属性有意义的情况。保持逻辑顺序为文档的阅读和制表符顺序，并以最易于访问和结构化的方式进行维护。然后使用 order 进行纯粹的视觉设计调整。这样做时请注意，不要重新排序用户在四处浏览时可以通过键盘访问的项目。尤其是在使用较新的布局方法时，应确保浏览器测试包括仅使用键盘而不是鼠标或触摸屏来测试站点。您将快速查看您的开发选择是否会使内容难以理解。

Browsers are pretty good at dealing with text direction, and you don’t even need to be working in a rtl language to take a look. In the example below, I have two paragraphs. One has no text-align property set, the second has text-align set to left. I have added dir="rtl" to the html element, which switches the writing mode from the default for an English language document of ltr. You can see that the first paragraph remains left to right, due to the text-align value being left . The second however, switches direction and the text runs from right to left .

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates how the Dutch ij digraph must be handled like one single letter.
trans-unit.target: 这说明了如何将Dutch ij字母二字像一个字母一样处理。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates how the Greek character sigma (Σ) is transformed into the regular lowercase sigma (σ) or the word-final variant (ς), according the context.
trans-unit.target: 这说明了如何根据上下文将希腊字符sigma（ Σ ）转换为规则的小写sigma（ σ ）或单词最终变体（ ς ）。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates how the Lithuanian letters Ĩ and J́ retain their dot when transformed to lowercase.
This demonstrates no text transformation.
trans-unit.target: 这表明没有文字转换。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates text capitalization.
trans-unit.target: 这演示了文字大写。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates transforming the text to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 这演示了将文本转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates transforming the text to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 这演示了将文本转换为大写字母。

trans-unit.source: This demostrates how initial punctuations of a word are ignored. The keyword target the first letter, that is the first Unicode character part of the Letter or Number general category.
trans-unit.target: 这演示了一个单词的首字母标点是如何被忽略的。关键字的目标是第一个字母,也就是字母或数字通用类别的第一个Unicode字符部分。

trans-unit.source: This details all the current ways in which column boxes can be styled. In the next guide we will take a look at making elements inside a container span across all columns.
trans-unit.target: 这详细介绍了可用于设置列框样式的所有当前方法。在下一个指南中，我们将研究使容器内的元素跨所有列。

trans-unit.source: This diagram shows block and inline in a vertical writing mode:
trans-unit.target: 这张图显示了垂直书写模式下的块状和内联。

trans-unit.source: This diagram uses outdated terminology; see note below. Besides that, it is incorrect because the yellow ellipse on the right side is per definition either identical to the one on the left side, or bigger than that (it could be a mathematical superset), because the spec says "Inline-level elements generate inline-level boxes, which are boxes that participate in an inline formatting context", see CSS 2.2, chapter 9.2.2
trans-unit.target: 这张图使用的是过时的术语;见下面的说明。除此之外,它是不正确的,因为按照定义,右边的黄色椭圆要么与左边的椭圆相同,要么比左边的椭圆大(它可能是一个数学超集),因为规范中说 "内联级元素生成内联级框,即参与内联格式化上下文的框",见CSS 2.2,第9.2.2章。

trans-unit.source: This ensures a minimum size of 1rem, with a text size that scales if the page is zoomed.
This ensures a minimum size of 1rem, with a text size that will scale if the page is zoomed.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保最小大小为1rem，并且文本大小将在页面缩放时缩放。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that text size will scale if the page is zoomed.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了在页面被缩放时,文字大小将被缩放。

trans-unit.source: This event object also includes the media and matches properties, so you can query these features of the MediaQueryList by directly accessing it, or accessing the event object.
trans-unit.target: 此事件对象还包括 media 和 matches 属性，因此您可以通过直接访问 MediaQueryList 或访问事件对象来查询MediaQueryList的这些功能。

trans-unit.source: This example adds "Section [the value of the counter]:" to the beginning of each heading.
trans-unit.target: 本例在每个标题的开头添加 "节[计数器的值]:"。

trans-unit.source: This example applies a spacing of .5em vertically and 1em horizontally between a table's cells. Note how, along its outside edges, the table's padding values are added to its border-spacing values.
trans-unit.target: 本示例在表格的单元格之间垂直应用 .5em 水平间距，水平应用 1em 的间距。请注意如何沿着表格的外部边缘将表格的 padding 值添加到其 border-spacing 值中。

trans-unit.source: This example applies special font and border styles when the placeholder is shown.
This example applies special styles to the labels associated with indeterminate form fields.
trans-unit.target: 本例将特殊的样式应用于与不确定表格字段关联的标签。

trans-unit.source: This example compares a default tab size with a custom tab size. Note that white-space is set to pre to prevent the tabs from collapsing.
This example compares the results of overflow-wrap, word-break, and hyphens when breaking up a long word.
trans-unit.target: 本示例比较了 word-break 长单词时的 overflow-wrap ，word-break和 hyphens 的结果。

trans-unit.source: This example computes and displays the used width value of three elements (updates on resize):
trans-unit.target: 本示例计算并显示三个元素的使用 width 值（调整大小时更新）：

trans-unit.source: This example creates a <div> block with a gradient background image. The gradient is established as a CSS shape using shape-outside, so that pixels within the gradient which are at least 20% opaque (that is, those pixels with an alpha component greater than 0.2) are considered part of the shape.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建带有渐变背景图像的 <div> 块。使用 shape-outside 将渐变建立为CSS形状，以便将渐变内至少20％不透明的像素（即那些alpha分量大于0.2的像素）视为该形状的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a border image using the following ".png" file, which is 90 by 90 pixels:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子使用下面的".png "文件创建了一个边框图像,它的像素是90×90。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a small checkbox for users with at least one fine pointer and a large checkbox for users with at least one coarse pointer. The big checkbox takes precedence because it is declared after the small one.
This example creates a small checkbox for users with fine pointers and a large checkbox for users with coarse pointers.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子为使用细指针的用户创建了一个小的复选框,为使用粗指针的用户创建了一个大的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a small checkbox for users with fine primary pointers and a large checkbox for users with coarse primary pointers.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子为细主指针的用户创建了一个小的复选框,为粗主指针的用户创建了一个大的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This example creates an animation that can be started and stopped again using the provided button, and a select menu that can be used to switch its easing function between the available keywords, plus a couple of cubic-bezier() and steps() options. The idea is to provide an easy comparison between different easing functions.
This example demonstrates all of the writing modes, showing each with text in various languages.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了所有的写作模式,用不同的语言文字展示了每种模式。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates both types of values for the -ms-content-zoom-snap-points property. In the first selector, the first snap-point is at 0%, and the interval is set to 100%. In the second selector, each snap-point is listed separately—100%, 200%, 300%, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 本示例演示了 -ms-content-zoom-snap-points 属性的两种类型的值。在第一个选择器中，第一个捕捉点为0％，间隔设置为100％。在第二个选择器中，每个捕捉点分别列出-100％，200％，300％，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates both types of values for the -ms-scroll-snap-points-x property. In the first selector, the first snap-point is at 0%, and the interval is set to 100%. In the second selector, each snap-point is listed separately — 100%, 200%, 300%, and so on. (The -ms-scroll-snap-points-x property behaves identically to the -ms-scroll-snap-points-y property, but along the x-axis.)
trans-unit.target: 本示例演示了 -ms-scroll-snap-points-x 属性的两种类型的值。在第一个选择器中，第一个捕捉点为0％，间隔设置为100％。在第二个选择器中，每个捕捉点分别列出-100％，200％，300％，依此类推。 （ -ms-scroll-snap-points-x 属性的行为与 -ms-scroll-snap-points-y 属性相同，但沿x轴。）

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates both types of values for the -ms-scroll-snap-points-y property. In the first selector, the first snap-point is at 0%, and the interval is set to 100%. In the second selector, each snap-point is listed separately — 100%, 200%, 300%, and so on. (The -ms-scroll-snap-points-y property behaves identically to the -ms-scroll-snap-points-x property, but along the y-axis.)
trans-unit.target: 本示例演示了 -ms-scroll-snap-points-y 属性的两种类型的值。在第一个选择器中，第一个捕捉点为0％，间隔设置为100％。在第二个选择器中，每个捕捉点分别列出-100％，200％，300％，依此类推。（ -ms-scroll-snap-points-y 属性的行为与 -ms-scroll-snap-points-x 属性相同，但沿y轴。）

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the difference in behavior of the bottom property, when position is absolute versus fixed.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了当 position 为 absolute 或 fixed 时， bottom 属性的行为差异。

trans-unit.source: This example disables input method support for a form field. In the past, this was commonly used on fields that entered data into databases which didn't support extended character sets.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子禁用了对表单字段的输入法支持,过去,这通常用于向不支持扩展字符集的数据库输入数据的字段。在过去,这通常用于将数据输入到不支持扩展字符集的数据库的字段。

trans-unit.source: This example disables mouse events (clicking, dragging, hovering, etc.) on all images.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子禁用了所有图片上的鼠标事件(点击、拖动、悬停等)。

trans-unit.source: This example disables mouse events on the link to http://example.com.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子禁用了链接http://example.com 上的鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: This example disables pointer events (clicking, dragging, hovering, etc.) on all images.
This example disables pointer events on the link to http://example.com.
This example draws a heading with triangles used to emphasize each character.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子画了一个标题,用三角形来强调每个字符。

trans-unit.source: This example first includes a script defining a <simple-custom>custom element:
trans-unit.target: 此示例首先包括定义 <simple-custom> 自定义元素的脚本：

trans-unit.source: This example has a scaling animation by default. If Reduce Motion is enabled in your accessibility preferences, the animation is toned down to a simple dissolve without vestibular motion triggers.
This example has an annoying animation unless you turn on Reduce Motion in your accessibility preferences.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子有一个恼人的动画,除非你在你的可访问性偏好中打开减少运动。

trans-unit.source: This example has an annoying color palette by default. This example does not take advantage of the colors provided by the user agent.
This example has an annoying low contrast by default.
This example has an annoying transparency effect by default.
This example illustrates the effect of ::first-letter on special punctuation and non-Latin characters.
This example implements something very similar to the interactive example above, except that here we'll explain to you how it's implemented.
This example includes an item which has positioning for columns. Items with definite placement are placed before the masonry layout happens.
This example inserts additional text after special items in a list.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在列表中的特殊项目后插入了附加文本。

trans-unit.source: This example inserts an image before each link, and adds its id attribute after.
trans-unit.target: 本示例在每个链接之前插入一个图像，并在其后添加其 id 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example inserts an image before the link. If the image is not found, it inserts text instead.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在链接前插入了一张图片。如果找不到图片,则插入文本。

trans-unit.source: This example inserts quotation marks around quotes, and adds the word "Chapter" before headings.
trans-unit.target: 本例在引号周围插入引号,并在标题前加上 "章 "字。

trans-unit.source: This example is duplicated from scroll-snap-type with minor variances.
trans-unit.target: 此示例是从 scroll-snap-type 复制的，只有很小的差异。

trans-unit.source: This example is similar to the previous one, except that its size is specified as farthest-corner, which sets the size of the gradient by the distance from the starting point to the farthest corner of the enclosing box from the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 此示例与上一个示例相似，不同之处在于，它的大小指定为“ farthest-corner ，它通过从起点到封闭框到起点的最远角之间的距离来设置渐变的大小。

trans-unit.source: This example loads an image and uses it in four segments to draw the Firefox logo in four <div> blocks. Clicking on their container causes the four segments to rotate around by swapping the background-image property values among the four <div> blocks.
trans-unit.target: 本示例加载图像，并在四个部分中使用它在四个 <div> 块中绘制Firefox徽标。单击它们的容器可通过在四个 <div> 块之间交换 background-image 属性值来使四个段旋转。

trans-unit.source: This example matches the following values:
trans-unit.target: 本例符合以下数值:

trans-unit.source: This example performs a four-second font size transition when the user hovers over the element, the transition-property is the font-size.
This example performs a four-second font size transition with a one-second delay when the user hovers over the element.
This example performs a four-second font size transition with a two-second delay between the time the user mouses over the element and the beginning of the animation effect:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子执行了一个四秒的字体大小转换,在用户将鼠标移到元素上和动画效果开始之间有两秒的延迟。

trans-unit.source: This example presents a simple form that colors elements green when they validate and red when they don't.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了一个简单的表单,当元素验证时,它的颜色为绿色,而当元素不验证时,它的颜色为红色。

trans-unit.source: This example provides a simple graphic, along with a select menu to allow you to choose between the different types of filter function, and a slider to allow you to vary the values used inside the filter function. Updating the controls updates the filter effect in real time, allowing you to investigate the effects of different filters.

This example renders a list using Roman numerals. Notice that a range is specified. This is because the representation will produce correct Roman numerals only until the counter value of 3999. Once outside of the range, the rest of the counter representations will be based on the decimal style, which is the fall back. If you need to represent counter values as Roman numerals, you could use either one of the predefined counter styles, upper-roman or lower-roman, rather than recreating the rule yourself.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用罗马数字呈现列表。请注意，已指定 range 。这是因为该表示将仅在计数器值 3999 之前产生正确的罗马数字。一旦超出范围，其余的计数器表示将基于 decimal 形式，即小数形式。如果需要将计数器值表示为罗马数字，则可以使用预定义的计数器样式中的 upper-roman 或 lower-roman ，而不用自己重新创建规则。

trans-unit.source: This example replaces an element content with an image. You can replace the contents of an element with either an <url> or other <image> value. Content added with ::before or ::after will not be generated as the contents of the element are replaced.
trans-unit.target: 本示例将元素内容替换为图像。您可以用<url>或其他<image>值替换元素的内容。用:: before或:: after添加的内容将不会生成，因为替换了元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: This example replaces an element's content with an image. You can replace the contents of an element with either a <url> or an <image> value. Content added with ::before or ::after will not be generated as the contents of the element have been replaced.
This example reproduces the previous example using SVG.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子使用SVG重现了之前的例子。

trans-unit.source: This example require font "Yu Gothic" installed in your OS, other fonts may not support OpenType features.
This example shows a basic shipping form. It uses the JavaScriptchange event to let the user enable/disable the billing fields.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了基本的运输形式。它使用JavaScript change 事件让用户启用/禁用计费字段。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a cube with the perspective set at different positions. How quick the cube shrinks is defined by the perspective property. The smaller its value is, the deeper the perspective is.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了将透视图设置在不同位置的多维数据集。多维数据集收缩的速度由 perspective 属性定义。其值越小，透视图越深。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a cube with the perspective set at different positions. How quick the cube shrinks is defined by the perspective property. The smaller its value is, the deeper the perspective is.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了将透视图设置在不同位置的多维数据集。多维数据集收缩的速度由 perspective 属性定义。其值越小，透视图越深。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a cube with transparent faces, and one with opaque faces.
This example shows a cube with transparent faces.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子显示了一个具有透明面的立方体。

trans-unit.source: This example shows cubes with popular perspective-origin values.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示具有流行的 perspective-origin 值的多维数据集。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how :where() works, and also illustrates the difference between :where() and :is().
This example shows how different box-sizing values alter the rendered size of two otherwise identical elements.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明了不同的 box-sizing 值如何改变两个原本相同的元素的渲染大小。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how nested elements can also be targeted. Note that the universal selector (*) is implied when no simple selector is written.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了如何也可以定位嵌套元素。请注意，如果未编写任何简单选择器，则暗含通用选择器（ * ）。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use image-set() to provide two alternative background-image options, chosen depending on the resolution needed: a normal version and a high-resolution version.
This example shows the difference between the appearance of optimizeSpeed and optimizeLegibility (in your browser; other browsers may vary).
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了 optimizeSpeed 和 optimizeLegibility 的外观之间的差异（在您的浏览器中；其他浏览器可能会有所不同）。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the many ways in which a single color can be created with the various RGB color syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了用各种RGB颜色语法创建单一颜色的多种方法。

trans-unit.source: This example shows why it is better to use <number> values instead of <length> values. We will use two <div> elements. The first, with the green border, uses a unitless line-height value. The second, with the red border, uses a line-height value defined in ems.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明了为什么最好使用 <number> 值而不是 <length> 值。我们将使用两个 <div> 元素。第一个带有绿色边框，使用无单位的 line-height 值。第二个带有红色边框，使用在 em 中定义的 line-height 值。

trans-unit.source: This example simply specifies a downloadable font to use, applying it to the entire body of the document:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子只是简单地指定了要使用的下载字体,并将其应用于整个文档的正文。

trans-unit.source: This example uses repeating-linear-gradient() to create a gradient that progresses repeatedly in a straight line. The colors get cycled over again as the gradient repeats. In this case the gradient line is 10px long.
This example uses repeating-linear-gradient() to create a gradient that progresses repeatedly in a straight line. The colors get cycled over and over as the gradient repeats.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 repeating-linear-gradient() 创建沿直线重复进行的渐变。随着渐变的重复，颜色会一遍又一遍地循环。

trans-unit.source: This example uses repeating-radial-gradient() to create a gradient that radiates repeatedly from a central point. The colors get cycled over and over as the gradient repeats.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 repeating-radial-gradient() 创建从中心点重复辐射的渐变。随着渐变的重复，颜色会一遍又一遍地循环。

trans-unit.source: This example uses -ms-scrollbar-base-color and -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color to create two <div> objects with different scroll bar color schemes.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 -ms-scrollbar-base-color 和 -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color 创建具有不同滚动条配色方案的两个 <div> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This example uses -ms-scrollbar-face-color and -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color to display a scroll bar with a blue scroll box and arrows, and a scroll bar with a green scroll box and arrows.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 -ms-scrollbar-face-color 和 -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color 显示带有蓝色滚动框和箭头的滚动条，以及带有绿色滚动框和箭头的滚动条。

trans-unit.source: This example uses -ms-scrollbar-highlight-color, -ms-scrollbar-face-color, and -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color to create two <div> objects with different scroll bar color schemes.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 -ms-scrollbar-highlight-color ， -ms-scrollbar-face-color 和 -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color 创建具有不同滚动条配色方案的两个 <div> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This example uses -ms-scrollbar-track-color, -ms-scrollbar-face-color, and -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color to create two <div> elements with different scroll bar color schemes.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 -ms-scrollbar-track-color ， -ms-scrollbar-face-color 和 -ms-scrollbar-arrow-color 创建具有不同滚动条配色方案的两个 <div> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This example uses ::after, in conjunction with the attr() CSS expression and a data-descrcustom data attribute, to create tooltips. No JavaScript is required!
trans-unit.target: 此示例将 ::after 和 attr() CSS表达式以及 data-descr 自定义数据属性结合使用，以创建工具提示。不需要JavaScript！

trans-unit.source: This example uses closest-side, which makes the circle's size to be the distance between the starting point (the center) and the closest side. The circle's radius is half the height of the box, since the top and bottom edges are equidistant from the starting point and are closer than the left and right edges.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用了 closest-side ，这使圆的大小成为起点（中心）与最近侧之间的距离。圆的半径是框的高度的一半，因为顶部和底部边缘与起点等距，并且比左侧和右侧边缘更近。

trans-unit.source: This example uses closest-side, which makes the circle's size to be the distance between the starting point (the center) and the closest side. The circle's radius is the distance between the center of the gradient and the closest edge, which due to the positioning of the 25% from the top and 25% from the bottom, is closest to the bottom, since the height in this case is narrower than the width.

This example uses CSS to create a classic two-sidebar layout surrounding a content block. The Flexible Box Layout Module automatically creates blocks of equal vertical size and uses as much horizontal space as available.
This example uses a fixed table layout, combined with the width property, to restrict the table's width. The text-overflow property is used to apply an ellipsis to words that are too long to fit.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用固定的表格布局以及 width 属性，以限制表格的宽度。该 text-overflow 属性用来省略号适用于那些太长的话。

trans-unit.source: This example uses a fixed table layout, combined with the width property, to restrict the table's width. The text-overflow property is used to apply an ellipsis to words that are too long to fit. If the table layout were auto, the table would grow to accomodate its contents, despite the specified width.

This example uses a hidden <button> element in a repeating pattern as its background. This demonstrates that you can use arbitrary elements as background, but doesn't necessarily demonstrate good design practices.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用重复模式中的隐藏 <button> 元素作为背景。这说明您可以使用任意元素作为背景，但不一定要说明良好的设计习惯。

trans-unit.source: This example uses a hidden <div> as a background. The background element uses a gradient, but also includes text that is rendered as part of the background.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用隐藏的 <div> 作为背景。背景元素使用渐变，但也包含作为背景一部分呈现的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example uses multi-position color stops, with adjacent colors having the same color stop value, creating a striped effect.

This example uses the -ms-accelerator attribute in a <u> element to specify that the "N" in the <label> element is a keyboard shortcut. When the option to "Hide keyboard navigation indicators until I use the Alt key" is enabled in the user's Display Properties, the "N" is not underlined until the user presses the

This guide covers flow layout and is therefore not referring to other possible formatting contexts. As such, it is useful to understand that creating any kind of formatting context will change the way elements inside that formatting context behave. This behavior is always described in the specification and also here on MDN.

This guide covers flow layout and is therefore not referring to other possible formatting contexts. As such, it is useful to understand that creating any kind of formatting context will change the way elements inside that formatting context behave. This behaviour is always described in the specification and also here on MDN.

trans-unit.source: This guide describes the standard coordinate systems used by the CSS object model. These are generally only different in terms of where their origin is located.

trans-unit.source: This guide often referrs to "Block and Inline formatting contexts" and how elements behave when part of these contexts. This guide details what formatting contexts are and how we can make use of the way they behave.
trans-unit.target: 本指南经常提到 "块和内联格式化上下文",以及当元素成为这些上下文的一部分时如何表现。本指南详细介绍了什么是格式化上下文以及我们如何利用它们的行为方式。

trans-unit.source: This guide presents demonstrations of how box alignment in grid layout works. You will see many similarities in how these properties and values work in flexbox. Due to grid being two-dimensional and flexbox one-dimensional there are some small differences that you should watch out for. So we will start by looking at the two axes that we deal with when aligning things in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍了网格布局中的方框对齐方式的演示。你会看到这些属性和值在flexbox中的工作方式有很多相似之处。由于网格是二维的,而flexbox是一维的,所以有一些小的差异是你应该注意的。所以我们将从我们在网格中对齐事物时处理的两个轴开始。

trans-unit.source: This is a very simple example of the problem with physical values and properties being used in CSS. They prevent the browser being able to do the work to switch writing mode, as they make the assumption that the text is flowing left to right and top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常简单的例子,说明CSS中使用的物理值和属性的问题。它们阻止了浏览器能够进行切换书写模式的工作,因为它们做出了文本是从左到右、从上到下流动的假设。

trans-unit.source: This is a very simple example, but it is the key for understanding the concept of stacking context. There are the same four DIVs of the previous example, but now z-index properties are assigned on both levels of the hierarchy.

This is all looking fairly complete now, however we sometimes have these cards which contain far more content than the others. It might be nice to cause those to span two tracks, and then they won’t be so tall. I have a class of wide on my larger item, and I add a rule grid-column-end with a value of span 2. Now when grid encounters this item, it will assign it two tracks. At some breakpoints, this means that we'll get a gap in the grid – where there isn’t space to lay out a two-track item.
trans-unit.target: 现在看起来都比较完整，但是有时候我们拥有的这些卡片比其他卡片包含的内容要多得多。使它们跨越两条轨道可能会很好，然后它们不会那么高。我在较大的项目上有一类 wide ，并添加了一个值为 span 2 的规则 grid-column-end 。现在，当网格遇到此项目时，它将为它分配两个轨道。在某些断点处，这意味着我们将在网格中留出空隙–没有空间布置两轨项目。

trans-unit.source: This is an example showing how to apply the will-change property through scripting, which is probably what you should be doing in most cases.

This is anti-clockwise! So the reverse of what we do for margins and padding. Once you realize that grid-area sees the world as "block and inline", you can remember that we are setting the two starts, then the two ends. It becomes much more logical once you know!
trans-unit.target: 这是逆时针！因此，与我们对边距和填充进行的操作相反。一旦意识到 grid-area 将世界视为“块和内联”，就可以记住我们正在设置两个起点，然后是两个终点。一旦知道，它将变得更加合乎逻辑！

trans-unit.source: This is something new to digital fonts and CSS, but is actually a centuries-old technique in designing and creating metal type. Optical sizing refers to the practice of varying the overall stroke thickness of letterforms based on physical size. If the size was very small (such as an equivalent to 10 or 12px), the characters would have an overall thicker stroke, and perhaps other small modifications to ensure that it would reproduce and be readable at a physically smaller size. Conversely, when a much larger size was being used (like 48 or 60px), there might be much greater variation in thick and thin stroke weights, showing the typeface design more in line with the original intent.
trans-unit.target: 这对于数字字体和CSS来说是一种新的东西,但实际上是设计和创建金属字体的一种百年技术。光学尺寸指的是根据物理尺寸改变字母形状的整体笔画厚度的做法。如果尺寸非常小(如相当于10或12px),字符将有一个整体的粗笔画,也许还有其他小的修改,以确保在物理尺寸较小的情况下能够重现和可读。相反,当使用更大的尺寸时(如48或60px),可能会有更大的笔画粗细变化,显示字体设计更符合原意。

trans-unit.source: This is sometimes the trickiest thing to work out if you don't have any documentation that came with the fonts (many type designers and foundries will provide sample pages and CSS just for this very reason). trans-unit.source: This isn’t quite the same as flexbox. In the flexbox example, the items are larger than the 200 pixel basis before wrapping. I want my tracks to be a minimum of 200 pixels, so I set the maximum to be 1fr. Once the browser has worked out how many times 200 pixels will fit into the container–also taking account of grid gaps–it will treat the 1fr maximum as an instruction to share out the remaining space between the items.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be animated. Rather, it defines a path an animated element can follow. An offset path is either a specified path with one or multiple sub-paths or the geometry of a not-styled basic shape. The element’s exact position on the offset path is determined by the offset-distance property. Each shape or path must define an initial position for the computed value of 0 for offset-distance and an initial direction which specifies the rotation of the object to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能设置动画。相反，它定义了动画元素可以遵循的路径。偏移路径可以是具有一个或多个子路径的指定路径，也可以是未设置样式的基本形状的几何形状。元素在偏移路径上的确切位置由 offset-distance 属性确定。每个形状或路径必须为 offset-distance 的计算值 0 定义一个初始位置，并指定一个将对象旋转到初始位置的初始方向。

trans-unit.source: This property constrains the limit for touch zooming as well as values of the msContentZoomFactor property. This property has no effect on non-zoomable elements. See -ms-content-zooming for details on zoomable elements.

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path an animated element can follow. An offset path is either a specified path with one or multiple sub-paths or the geometry of a not-styled basic shape. This property doesn't appear to be supported anywhere yet. When it eventually starts to be supported, it will serve to define the source of the border mask.

This property doesn't appear to be supported anywhere yet. When it eventually starts to be supported, it will serve to define the width of the border mask — setting this to a different value to mask-border-slice will cause the slices to be scaled to fit the border mask.

This property doesn't appear to be supported anywhere yet. When it eventually starts to be supported, it will serve to move the mask away from the inner edge of the element's border box — you can use it to make the mask start from part way across the border, rather than the inside of it.

trans-unit.source: This scaling transformation is characterized by a three-dimensional vector. Its coordinates define how much scaling is done in each direction. If all three coordinates are equal, the scaling is uniform (isotropic) and the aspect ratio of the element is preserved (this is a homothetic transformation).
trans-unit.target: 该缩放变换的特征在于三维向量。它的坐标定义了每个方向的缩放比例。如果所有三个坐标都相等，则缩放比例是均匀的（各向同性），并且将保留元素的长宽比（这是同质变换）。

trans-unit.source: This scaling transformation is characterized by a two-dimensional vector. Its coordinates define how much scaling is done in each direction. If both coordinates are equal, the scaling is uniform (isotropic) and the aspect ratio of the element is preserved (this is a homothetic transformation).
trans-unit.target: 该缩放变换的特征在于二维矢量。它的坐标定义了每个方向的缩放比例。如果两个坐标相等，则缩放比例是均匀的（各向同性），并且将保留元素的长宽比（这是同质变换）。

trans-unit.source: This scaling transformation modifies the z-coordinate of each element point by a constant factor, except when the scale factor is 1, in which case the function is the identity transform. The scaling is not isotropic, and the angles of the element are not conserved. scaleZ(-1) defines an axial symmetry, with the z-axis passing through the origin (as specified by the transform-origin property).
trans-unit.target: 此缩放变换将每个元素点的z坐标修改为一个常数因子，除非缩放因子为1时（在这种情况下，函数为恒等变换）。缩放比例不是各向同性的，并且元素的角度也不守恒。 scaleZ(-1) 定义了一个轴对称性，其中z轴穿过原点（由 transform-origin 属性指定）。

trans-unit.source: This second example uses a grid to create the same layout. This time we are using the box alignment properties as they apply to a grid layout. In this case that is a single grid cell, but it could be an area made up of several grid cells.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例使用网格创建相同的布局。这次，我们将使用框对齐属性，因为它们适用于网格布局。因此，我们对齐 start 和 end 而不是 flex-start 和 flex-end 。在网格布局的情况下，我们在网格区域内对齐项目。在这种情况下，这是单个网格单元，但可能是由多个网格单元组成的区域。

trans-unit.source: This transformation applies to the 3D space and can't be represented on the plane.

trans-unit.source: This transformation is a shear mapping (transvection) that distorts each point within an element by a certain angle in the horizontal and vertical directions. The coordinates of each point are modified by a value proportionate to the specified angle and the distance to the origin; thus, the farther from the origin a point is, the greater will be the value added it.
trans-unit.target: 这种转换是剪切映射（对移），它使元素内的每个点在水平和垂直方向上变形一定角度。每个点的坐标都通过与指定角度和到原点的距离成比例的值进行修改；因此，一个点离原点越远，它所增加的值就越大。

trans-unit.source: This transformation is a shear mapping (transvection) that distorts each point within an element by a certain angle in the horizontal and vertical directions. The effect is as if you grabbed each corner of the element and pulled them along a certain angle.

This transformation is a shear mapping (transvection) that distorts each point within an element by a certain angle in the horizontal direction. The abscissa coordinate of each point is modified by a value proportionate to the specified angle and the distance to the origin; thus, the farther from the origin a point is, the greater will be the value added it.
trans-unit.target: 此变换是剪切映射（对移），它使元素内的每个点在水平方向上变形一定角度。每个点的横坐标都通过与指定角度和到原点的距离成比例的值进行修改；因此，一个点离原点越远，它所增加的值就越大。

trans-unit.source: This transformation is a shear mapping (transvection) that distorts each point within an element by a certain angle in the vertical direction. The ordinate coordinate of each point is modified by a value proportionate to the specified angle and the distance to the origin; thus, the farther from the origin a point is, the greater will be the value added it.
trans-unit.target: 这种转换是剪切映射（对移），它使元素内的每个点在垂直方向上变形一定角度。每个点的纵坐标都用与指定角度和到原点的距离成比例的值修改；因此，一个点离原点越远，它所增加的值就越大。

trans-unit.source: This transformation is characterized by a three-dimensional vector. Its coordinates define how much the element moves in each direction.

trans-unit.source: This uses window.getComputedStyle() to fetch the style of each element, shifting it to the following element. trans-unit.source: Those of us who have been doing web development for more years than we care to remember might consider that CSS Grid is a little bit like using “tables for layout”. Back in the early days of web design, the way we constructed page layout was to use HTML tables, then fragment our design into the cells of those tables in order to create a layout. This had some advantages over the “CSS Positioning” that came afterwards, in that we could take advantage of the alignment and full height columns offered by table display. The biggest downside however was that it tied our design to the mark-up, often creating accessibility issues as it did so. In order to lay the design out in the table we often broke up the content in ways that made no sense at all when read out by a screen reader for example.
trans-unit.target: 我们从事Web开发已经超过我们所记得的多年的人可能会认为CSS Grid有点像使用“表格布局”。在Web设计的早期，我们构造页面布局的方法是使用HTML表，然后将设计分成这些表的单元格以创建布局。与随后出现的“ CSS定位”相比，这具有一些优势，因为我们可以利用表格显示提供的对齐和全高列。但是，最大的缺点是，它会将我们的设计与标记捆绑在一起，从而经常造成可访问性问题。为了将设计摆在桌子上，我们经常以一种根本没有意义的方式来分解内容，例如，当被屏幕阅读器读出时，根本没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Though submitted to the W3C, with positive initial feedback, this property is not yet part of any specification; currently, this is a Mozilla-specific extension (that is, -moz-orient).
trans-unit.target: 尽管已提交给W3C，并获得了积极的初步反馈，但此属性尚未成为任何规范的一部分；当前，这是Mozilla特定的扩展名（即 -moz-orient ）。

To reduce the size of style sheets, one can group selectors in comma-separated lists.

To round off this set of guides to CSS Grid Layout, I am going to walk through a few different layouts, which demonstrate some of the different techniques you can use when designing with grid layout. We will look at an example using grid-template-areas, a typical 12-column flexible grid system, and also a product listing using auto-placement. As you can see from this set of examples, there is often more than one way to achieve the result you want with grid layout. Choose the method you find most helpful for the problems that you are solving and the designs that you need to implement.
trans-unit.target: 为了完善这套CSS网格布局指南，我将逐步介绍一些不同的布局，这些布局演示了在设计网格布局时可以使用的一些不同技术。我们将看一个使用grid-template-areas的示例（一个典型的12列柔性网格系统），以及一个使用自动放置的产品列表。从这组示例中可以看到，使用网格布局来获得所需的结果通常不止一种方法。选择对您要解决的问题和需要实施的设计最有用的方法。

To switch the display of the media object so that the image is on the right and the content is on the left we can use the flex-direction property set to row-reverse. The media object now displays the other way around. I have achieved this in the live example by adding a class of flipped alongside the existing .media class. This means you can see how the display changes by removing that class from the html.
trans-unit.target: 要切换媒体对象的显示，以使图像位于右侧，内容位于左侧，我们可以使用将 flex-direction 属性设置为 row-reverse 。媒体对象现在显示另一种方式。我在现场例如通过添加类来实现这个 flipped 沿着现有的 .media 类。这意味着您可以通过从html中删除该类来查看显示的变化。

trans-unit.source: To talk about these properties we need to understand the concept of positive and negative free space. When a flex container has positive free space, it has more space than is required to display the flex items inside the container. For example, if I have a 500 pixel-wide container, flex-direction is row, and I have three flex items each 100 pixels wide, then I have 200 pixels of positive free space, which could be distributed between the items if I wanted them to fill the container.
trans-unit.target: 要谈论这些属性，我们需要了解正和负自由空间的概念。当伸缩容器具有正的可用空间时，其空间比在容器中显示伸缩项所需的空间更多。例如，如果我有一个500像素宽的容器， flex-direction 是 row ，并且我有三个flex项，每一个100像素宽，那么我有200像素的正可用空间，如果需要，可以在项目之间分配他们填充容器。

trans-unit.source: To use a CSS counter, it must first be initialized to a value with the counter-reset property (0 by default). The same property can also be used to change its value to any specific number. Once initialized, a counter's value can be increased or decreased with counter-increment. The counter's name must not be "none", "inherit", or "initial"; otherwise the declaration is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 要使用CSS计数器，必须首先使用 counter-reset 属性将其初始化为一个值（默认为 0 ）。相同的属性也可以用于将其值更改为任何特定的数字。初始化后，可以通过 counter-increment 增大或减小计数器的值。计数器的名称不能为“ none”，“ heritit”或“ initial”。否则，声明将被忽略。

Tracks can be defined using any length unit. Grid also introduces an additional length unit to help us create flexible grid tracks. The new fr unit represents a fraction of the available space in the grid container. The next grid definition would create three equal width tracks that grow and shrink according to the available space.

trans-unit.source: Under the "fixed" layout method, the entire table can be rendered once the first table row has been downloaded and analyzed. This can speed up rendering time over the "automatic" layout method, but subsequent cell content might not fit in the column widths provided. Cells use the overflow property to determine whether to clip any overflowing content, but only if the table has a known width; otherwise, they won't overflow the cells.
trans-unit.target: 在“固定”布局方法下，一旦下载并分析了第一行表，就可以呈现整个表。与“自动”布局方法相比，这可以加快渲染时间，但是后续的单元格内容可能不适合所提供的列宽。单元格使用 overflow 属性来确定是否剪辑任何溢出内容，但前提是表格的宽度已知；否则，它们将不会溢出单元格。

trans-unit.source: Understanding the reference box used by CSS Shapes is important when using Basic Shapes, as it defines each shape's coordinate system. You have already met the reference box in the guide on creating shapes from Box Values, which directly uses the reference box to create the shape.
trans-unit.target: 使用基本形状时，了解CSS Shapes使用的参考框非常重要，因为它定义了每个形状的坐标系。您已经在使用Box Values创建形状的指南中找到了参考框，该指南直接使用参考框创建形状。

trans-unit.source: Understanding which axis is which is important when we start to look at aligning and justifying flex items; flexbox features properties that align and justify content along one axis or the other.
trans-unit.target: 当我们开始研究对齐和证明flex项目时,理解哪个轴是很重要的;flexbox的特性是沿着一个轴或另一个轴对齐和证明内容的属性。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately this is impossible to do with CSS and HTML without forcing column breaks at fixed positions, or severely restricting the markup allowed in the text, or using heroic scripting. This limitation is solved by adding new CSS properties to extend the traditional block layout mode.
trans-unit.target: 遗憾的是,如果不在固定位置强制换栏,或者严格限制文本中允许的标记,或者使用英雄脚本,这在CSS和HTML中是不可能做到的。通过添加新的CSS属性来扩展传统的块状布局模式来解决这个限制。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, these valid values can be used, via the var() functional notation, in a context where they might not make sense. Properties and custom variables can lead to invalid CSS statements, leading to the new concept of valid at computed time.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，这些有效值可以通过 var() 函数符号在可能没有意义的上下文中使用。属性和自定义变量可能导致无效的CSS语句，从而导致在计算时有效的新概念。

trans-unit.source: Unlike HTML, CSS will completely ignore unknown keywords.
trans-unit.target: 与HTML不同,CSS会完全忽略未知的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Internet Explorer, Firefox's implementation of ime-mode allows this property on <input type="password">. However, this makes for a bad user experience, and password fields should not enable the IME. Users may correct the inappropriate behavior of sites that don't follow this recommendation by placing the following CSS into their user stylesheet:
trans-unit.target: 与Internet Explorer不同，Firefox的 ime-mode 实现允许在 <input type="password"> 上使用此属性。但是，这会带来不良的用户体验，并且密码字段不应启用IME。用户可以通过将以下CSS放入用户样式表中来纠正不遵循此建议的网站的不当行为：

trans-unit.source: Unlike linear gradients, you can specify the size of radial gradients.
trans-unit.target: 与线性梯度不同,你可以指定径向梯度的大小。

trans-unit.source: Unlike linear gradients, you can specify the size of radial gradients. Possible values include closest-corner, closest-side, farthest-corner, and farthest-side, with farthest-corner being the default. Circles can also be sized with a length, and ellipses a length or percentage.

Unlike the <p> element's box, Web developers cannot control the style of the two anonymous boxes. Inheritable properties take the value from the <div>'s property value, like color to define the color of the text, and set the others to the initial value. For example, they won't have a specific background-color, it is always transparent, the initial value for that property, and thus the background of the <div> is visible. A specific background color can be applied to the <p> box. Similarly, the two anonymous boxes always use the same color for their text.
trans-unit.target: 与 <p> 元素的框不同，Web开发人员无法控制两个匿名框的样式。可继承属性从 <div> 的属性值中获取值，例如 color 来定义文本的颜色，并将其他设置为 initial 值。例如，它们将没有特定的 background-color ，它始终是透明的，该属性的 initial 值，因此 <div> 的背景是可见的。可以将特定的背景色应用于 <p> 框。同样，两个匿名框的文本始终使用相同的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the dir attribute in HTML, the direction property is not inherited from table columns into table cells, since CSS inheritance follows the document tree, and table cells are inside of rows but not inside of columns.
trans-unit.target: 不同于 dir 中的HTML属性，则 direction 属性不会从表中的列继承到表格单元格，因为CSS继承如下文档树，和表格单元格是行内而不是里面列。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 10, handling of text-overflow on blocks with inline overflow on both horizontal sides was incorrect. Before Firefox 10, if only one value was specified (such as text-overflow: ellipsis;), text was ellipsed on both sides of the block, instead of only the end edge based on the block's text direction.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 10之前的版本中，在水平两侧都带有内联溢出的块上的 text-overflow 处理是不正确的。在Firefox 10之前，如果仅指定一个值（例如 text-overflow: ellipsis; ），则文本将在块的两侧被省略，而不是仅基于块的文本方向的末端。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 25, page-break-inside: avoid did not work with the height of a block.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 25之前， page-break-inside : avoid 在一个块的高度上不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 47, SVGs without viewport were not sliced correctly (bug 619500).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 47之前，未正确切片没有视口的SVG（错误619500）。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 57, an issue persisted for SVGs without viewport when e10s was disabled (bug 1290782).
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 57之前，禁用e10时，没有视口的SVG仍然存在问题（错误1290782）。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 61, flex items that are sized according to their content are sized using fit-content, not max-content.
Until Firefox 61, flex items that are sized according to their content are sized using fit-content, not max-content.
Until Internet Explorer 8, inline-block is only for natural inline elements.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 8之前， inline-block 仅适用于自然内联元素。

trans-unit.source: Until the CSSWG publishes their own draft, the specification can only be found in its WICG Github Repository.
trans-unit.target: 在CSSWG发布自己的草案之前，只能在其WICG Github存储库中找到该规范。

trans-unit.source: Until version 15, only decimal numbers display.
trans-unit.target: 在15版之前,只显示十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Up to Internet Explorer 7, descendants of hidden elements will still be invisible even if they have visibility set to visible.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 7之前，即使 hidden 元素的后代将可见 visibility 设置为 visible ,它们也仍然是不可见的。

trans-unit.source: Usage notes
trans-unit.target: 使用说明

trans-unit.source: Usage with integers
Use "regular" scrolling, where the content immediately ceases to scroll when you remove your finger from the touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: 使用 "常规 "滚动,当您将手指从触摸屏上移开时,内容立即停止滚动。

trans-unit.source: Use @supports to apply styles that depend on browser support for various CSS technologies.
trans-unit.target: 使用 @supports 来应用依赖于各种CSS技术的浏览器支持的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use clear to force an item to move below a floated element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 clear 强制项目移至浮动元素下方。

trans-unit.source: Use inherit to make an element's property the same as its parent.
trans-unit.target: 使用 inherit 使元素的属性与其父元素相同。

trans-unit.source: Use initial to set a property to its initial value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 initial 将属性设置为其初始值。

trans-unit.source: Use revert to reset a property to the value established by the user-agent stylesheet (or by user styles, if any exist).
trans-unit.target: 使用 revert 将属性重置为由用户代理样式表（或如果存在的话，由用户样式）建立的值。

trans-unit.source: Use unset to set a property to its inherited value if it inherits, or to its initial value if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果未继承，请使用 unset 将属性设置为其继承的值，否则将其设置为初始值。

trans-unit.source: Use overflow-x: hidden and overflow-y: scroll, or overflow: scroll hidden instead.
trans-unit.target: 请使用 overflow-x: hidden 并使用 overflow-y: scroll ，或使用 overflow: scroll hidden 。

trans-unit.source: Use overflow-x: scroll and overflow-y: hidden, or overflow: hidden scroll instead.
trans-unit.target: 请使用 overflow-x: scroll 和 overflow-y: hidden ，或使用 overflow: hidden scroll 。

trans-unit.source: Use meter instead.
Use overflow: clip instead.
Use overflow: hidden instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用 overflow: hidden 。

trans-unit.source: Use textarea instead.
Use JavaScript and clear the animation being used when the animationiteration event fires.
trans-unit.target: 使用JavaScript并在 animationiteration 事件触发时清除正在使用的动画。

trans-unit.source: Use a minimum value of 1.5 for line-height for main paragraph content. This will help people experiencing low vision conditions, as well as people with cognitive concerns such as Dyslexia. If the page is zoomed to increase the text size, using a unitless value ensures that the line height will scale proportionately.
trans-unit.target: 使用的最小值 1.5 的 line-height 为主要内容的段落。这将帮助经历视力低下的人以及患有阅读障碍等认知问题的人。如果缩放页面以增加文本大小，则使用无单位值可确保行高将按比例缩放。

trans-unit.source: Use cases for auto-placement
trans-unit.target: 自动投放的使用案例

trans-unit.source: Use cases for order
trans-unit.target: 订单的使用案例

trans-unit.source: Use in a media query
trans-unit.target: 在媒体查询中使用

trans-unit.source: Use in calc()

Use momentum-based scrolling, where the content continues to scroll for a while after finishing the scroll gesture and removing your finger from the touchscreen. The speed and duration of the continued scrolling is proportional to how vigorous the scroll gesture was. Also creates a new stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于动量的滚动,即在完成滚动手势并将手指从触摸屏上移开后,内容会继续滚动一段时间。继续滚动的速度和持续时间与滚动手势的力度成正比。还可以创建一个新的堆叠上下文。

trans-unit.source: Use more specific rules. By indicating one or more elements before the element you're selecting, the rule becomes more specific and gets higher priority:

Use of the order property has exactly the same implications for accessibility as changing the direction with flex-direction. Using order changes the order in which items are painted, and the order in which they appear visually. It does not change the sequential navigation order of the items. Therefore if a user is tabbing between the items, they could find themselves jumping around your layout in a very confusing way.
trans-unit.target: 使用 order 属性对于可访问性具有与使用 flex-direction 更改方向完全相同的含义。使用 order 更改项目的绘制顺序和外观。它不会更改项目的顺序导航顺序。因此，如果用户在项目之间切换，他们可能会发现自己以非常混乱的方式在布局中跳跃。

trans-unit.source: Use the fill-available inline size or fill-available block size, as appropriate to the writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 fill-available 在线尺寸或 fill-available 块大小，以适于书写模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the character encoding defined by the referring document: the charset attribute of the <link> element. This method is obsoleted in HTML5 and must not be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用引用文档定义的字符编码： <link> 元素的 charset 属性。此方法在HTML5中已作废，不得使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the default line break rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的换行规则。

trans-unit.source: Use this CSS reference to browse an alphabetical index of all of the standard CSS properties, pseudo-classes, pseudo-elements, data types, functional notations and at-rules. You can also browse key CSS concepts and a list of selectors organized by type. Also included is a brief DOM-CSS / CSSOM reference.

Use this CSS reference to browse an alphabetical index of all the standard CSS properties, pseudo-classes, pseudo-elements, data types, and at-rules. You can also browse a list of all the CSS selectors organized by type and a list of key CSS concepts. Also included is a brief DOM-CSS / CSSOM reference.
trans-unit.target: 使用此CSS参考来浏览所有标准CSS属性，伪类，伪元素，数据类型和规则的字母索引。您还可以浏览按类型组织的所有CSS 选择器的列表以及关键CSS概念的列表。还包括一个简短的DOM-CSS / CSSOM参考。

trans-unit.source: Use this property with caution — setting scrollbar-width to thin or none can make content hard or impossible to scroll if the author does not provide an alternative scrolling mechanism. While swiping gestures or mouse wheels can enable scrolling on such content, some devices have no scroll alternative.
Used alongside an alignment keyword. If the chosen keyword means that the item overflows the alignment container causing data loss, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.
trans-unit.target: 与alignment关键字一起使用。如果选择的关键字意味着项目溢出对齐容器而导致数据丢失，则将对齐该项目，就好像对齐模式为 start 一样。

trans-unit.source: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container and whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.
trans-unit.target: 与对齐关键字一起使用。不管项目和对齐容器的相对大小,也不管是否会发生溢出而导致数据丢失的情况,给定的对齐值都会被尊重。

trans-unit.source: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container, and regardless of whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.
Used in the determination of the height of the viewport when the document is first displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定文档首次显示时视口的高度。

trans-unit.source: Used in the determination of the width of the viewport when the document is first displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定文档首次显示时视口的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Used the -moz-background-clip: padding | border syntax.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -moz-background-clip: padding | border 语法。

trans-unit.source: Used to access the Windows 10 custom accent color that you can set on the start menu, taskbar, title bars, etc.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问可以在开始菜单、任务栏、标题栏等处设置的Windows 10自定义重音色。

trans-unit.source: Used to access the color of text placed over the Windows 10 custom accent color in the start menu, taskbar, title bars, etc.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问放置在开始菜单、任务栏、标题栏等Windows 10自定义重音颜色上的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: Used to represent "sign-value" numbering systems, such as Roman numerals, which rather than reuse digits in different positions to obtain different values, define additional digits for larger values. The value of a number in such a system can be found out by adding the digits in the number.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示 "符号值 "的数字系统,如罗马数字,它不是在不同的位置重复使用数字来获得不同的值,而是为较大的值定义额外的数字。在这种系统中,一个数字的值可以通过将数字中的数字相加来求出。

trans-unit.source: Used value
trans-unit.target: 二手价值

trans-unit.source: Useful fallback techniques
trans-unit.target: 有用的后备技术

trans-unit.source: Useless selectors can be written using this pseudo-class. For example, :not(*) matches any element which is not an element, so the rule will never be applied.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此伪类编写无用的选择器。例如， :not(*) 匹配不是元素的任何元素，因此该规则将永远不会应用。

trans-unit.source: Useless selectors can be written using this pseudo-class. For example, :not(*) matches any element which is not an element, which is obviously nonsense, so the accompanying rule will never be applied.
User agents are allowed to ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理可以忽略这个属性。
